Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: I really like this idea, I think we should prioritize this higher. There are talks with other Hyperledger teams that need a tool for standing up networks, they could make use of this image for doing this work.

Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: Since we are migrating to the Go SDK users can now simply do `go get u github.com/hyperledger/fabric-test/tools/operator` to install the operator tool locally
